CustomField.formula: 11- MOD( VALUE (mid ( GLBP1_Rut__c, len(GLBP1_Rut__c) - 2, 1 )) *2 + VALUE (mid ( GLBP1_Rut__c, len(GLBP1_Rut__c) - 3, 1 )) *3 + VALUE (mid ( GLBP1_Rut__c, len(GLBP1_Rut__c) - 4, 1 )) *4 + VALUE (mid ( GLBP1_Rut__c, len(GLBP1_Rut__c) - 5, 1 )) *5 + VALUE (mid ( GLBP1_Rut__c, len(GLBP1_Rut__c) - 6, 1 )) *6 + VALUE (mid ( GLBP1_Rut__c, len(GLBP1_Rut__c) - 7, 1 )) *7 + VALUE (mid ( GLBP1_Rut__c, len(GLBP1_Rut__c) - 8, 1 )) *2 + IF( LEN(GLBP1_Rut__c) = 10, VALUE (mid ( GLBP1_Rut__c, len(GLBP1_Rut__c) - 9, 1 )) *3 , 0) , 11)
